core Package¶

core Package¶

Package implementing the core features for building and manipulating metabolic models.

@author: Daniel Machado

Copyright 2013 Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability, Technical University of Denmark.

See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.

fixes Module¶

Fixes to clean up common models from different sources/groups.

@author: Daniel Machado

Copyright 2013 Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability, Technical University of Denmark.

Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the “License”); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at

http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an “AS IS” BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.

framed.core.fixes.clean_bounds(model, threshold=1000)[source]¶

Remove artificially large bounds (unbounded = no bounds).

framed.core.fixes.fix_bigg_model(model, boundary_metabolites=True, reversibility=True, bounds=True)[source]¶

Fix models from BiGG.

Arguments:
boundary_metabolites : bool – remove boundary metabolites (ending with ‘_b’) (default: True) reversibility : bool – make reaction reversibility consistent with the bounds (default: True) clean_bounds : bool – remove artificially large bounds (unbounded = no bounds) (default: True)
framed.core.fixes.fix_reversibility(model)[source]¶

Make reaction reversibility consistent with the bounds.

framed.core.fixes.remove_boundary_metabolites(model)[source]¶

Remove remove boundary metabolites (ending with ‘_b’).

models Module¶

This module defines base classes for metabolic modeling.

@author: Daniel Machado

class framed.core.models.Compartment(elem_id, name=None)[source]¶

Base class for modeling compartments.

class framed.core.models.ConstraintBasedModel(model_id)[source]¶

Bases: framed.core.models.StoichiometricModel

Base class for constraint-based models. Extends StoichiometricModel with flux bounds.

add_reaction(reaction, lb=None, ub=None)[source]¶

Add a single reaction to the model. If a reaction with the same id exists, it will be replaced.

Arguments:
reaction : Reaction lb : float – lower bound (default: None) ub : float – upper bound (default: None)
detect_biomass_reaction()[source]¶

Detects biomass reaction in the model (searches for the word biomass)

Returns:
str – first reaction id that matches (or else None)
print_reaction(r_id, lookup_table=None)[source]¶

Print a reaction to a text based representation.

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id lookup_table : OrderedDict – reaction metabolite lookup table (optional, for speed)
Returns:
str – reaction string
remove_reactions(id_list)[source]¶

Remove a list of reactions from the model. Also removes all the edges connected to the reactions.

Arguments:
id_list : list of str – reaction ids
set_bounds(bounds_list)[source]¶

Define flux bounds for a set of reactions

Arguments:
bounds_list : list (of str, float, float) – reaction id, lower bound, upper bound
set_flux_bounds(r_id, lb, ub)[source]¶

Define flux bounds for one reaction

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id lb : float – lower bound (use None to represent negative infinity) ub : float – upper bound (use None to represent positive infinity)
set_lower_bound(r_id, lb)[source]¶

Define lower bound for one reaction

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id lb : float – lower bound (use None to represent negative infinity)
set_upper_bound(r_id, ub)[source]¶

Define upper bound for one reaction

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id ub : float – upper bound (use None to represent positive infinity)
class framed.core.models.GPRConstrainedModel(model_id)[source]¶

Bases: framed.core.models.ConstraintBasedModel

Base class for constraint-based models with GPR associations. Extends ConstraintBasedModel with genes and rules

add_gene(gene)[source]¶

Add a gene metabolite to the model. If a gene with the same id exists, it will be replaced.

Arguments:
gene : Gene
add_genes(genes)[source]¶

Add a list of genes to the model.

Arguments:
genes : list of Gene
add_reaction(reaction, lb=None, ub=None, rule=None)[source]¶

Add a single reaction to the model. If a reaction with the same id exists, it will be replaced.

Arguments:
reaction : Reaction lb : float – lower bound (default: None) ub : float – upper bound (default: None) rule : str – GPR association rule (default: None)
eval_GPR(active_genes)[source]¶

Evaluate the GPR associations.

Arguments:
active_genes : list (of str) – set of active genes
Returns:
list (of str) – set of active reactions
remove_reactions(id_list)[source]¶

Remove a list of reactions from the model. Also removes all the edges connected to the reactions.

Arguments:
id_list : list of str – reaction ids
set_rule(r_id, rule)[source]¶

Define GPR association rule for one reaction

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id rule : str – GPR association rule
set_rules(rules)[source]¶

Define GPR association rules for a set of reactions

Arguments:
rules : list (of (str, str)) – reaction id, rule
class framed.core.models.Gene(elem_id, name=None)[source]¶

Base class for modeling genes.

class framed.core.models.Metabolite(elem_id, name=None, compartment=None)[source]¶

Base class for modeling metabolites.

class framed.core.models.Reaction(elem_id, name=None, reversible=True)[source]¶

Base class for modeling reactions.

class framed.core.models.StoichiometricModel(model_id)[source]¶

Base class for all metabolic models implemented as a bipartite network. Contains the list of metabolites, reactions, compartments, and stoichiometry.

add_compartment(compartment)[source]¶

Add a single compartment to the model. If a compartment with the same id exists, it will be replaced.

Arguments:
compartment : Compartment
add_compartments(compartments)[source]¶

Add a list of compartments to the model.

Arguments:
compartments : list of Compartment
add_metabolite(metabolite)[source]¶

Add a single metabolite to the model. If a metabolite with the same id exists, it will be replaced. If the metabolite compartment is defined, then it must exist in the model.

Arguments:
metabolite : Metabolite
add_metabolites(metabolites)[source]¶

Add a list of metabolites to the model.

Arguments:
metabolites : list of Metabolite
add_reaction(reaction)[source]¶

Add a single reaction to the model. If a reaction with the same id exists, it will be replaced.

Arguments:
reaction : Reaction
add_reactions(reactions)[source]¶

Add a list of reactions to the model.

Arguments:
reactions : list of Reaction
add_stoichiometry(stoichiometry)[source]¶

Add stoichiometric coefficients (weighted edges between metabolites and reactions). Negative coefficients represent consumption, positive coefficients represent production. If coefficients for the same metabolite-reaction pairs exist in the model, they will be replaced.

Arguments:
stoichiometry : list of (str, str, float) – metabolite id, reaction id, coefficient
metabolite_reaction_lookup_table()[source]¶

Return the network topology as a nested map: metabolite id -> reaction id -> coefficient

Returns:
OrderedDict (of str to OrderedDict of str to float) – lookup table
print_reaction(r_id, lookup_table=None)[source]¶

Print a reaction to a text based representation.

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id lookup_table : OrderedDict – reaction metabolite lookup table (optional, for speed)
Returns:
str – reaction string
reaction_metabolite_lookup_table()[source]¶

Return the network topology as a nested map: reaction id -> metabolite id -> coefficient

Returns:
OrderedDict (of str to OrderedDict of str to float) – lookup table
remove_compartment(c_id, delete_metabolites=True)[source]¶

Remove a compartment from the model. Removes also all the metabolites in that compartment.

Arguments:
c_id : str – compartment id delete_metabolites : Bool – True (default)
remove_metabolite(m_id)[source]¶

Remove a single metabolite from the model. Also removes all the edges connected to the metabolite.

Arguments:
m_id : str – metabolite id
remove_metabolites(id_list)[source]¶

Remove a list of metabolites from the model. Also removes all the edges connected to the metabolites.

Arguments:
id_list : list of str – metabolite ids
remove_reaction(r_id)[source]¶

Remove a single reaction from the model. Also removes all the edges connected to the reaction.

Arguments:
r_id : str – reaction id
remove_reactions(id_list)[source]¶

Remove a list of reactions from the model. Also removes all the edges connected to the reactions.

Arguments:
id_list : list of str – reaction ids
stoichiometric_matrix()[source]¶

Return the full stoichiometric matrix represented by the network topology

Returns:
list (of list of float) – stoichiometric matrix

transformation Module¶

Module for model transformation operations.

@author: Daniel Machado

Copyright 2013 Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability, Technical University of Denmark.

See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.

framed.core.transformation.make_irreversible(model)[source]¶

Splits all reversible reactions into forward and backward directions. For efficiency the given model is converted. To keep a copy use deepcopy first.

Arguments:
model : StoichiometricModel
Returns:
dictionary (str to (str, str)): mapping of old reaction ids to splitted reaction ids
framed.core.transformation.simplify(model)[source]¶

Removes all blocked reactions in a constraint based model

Arguments:
model : ConstraintBasedModel
Returns:
list (of str): list of removed reactions
